translation.en: Trevor Bingley, on all 14 counts of dangerous driving…
translation.es: Trevor Bingley, de los 14 cargospor conducción peligrosa…

translation.en: [judge] Do you have anything to say before you're taken down?
translation.es: ¿Algo que decir antes de que se lo lleven?

translation.en: -You see… there was this bee -[inviting music begins]
[female voice] Darling, the car's going to be here any second.
translation.es: Cariño, el auto llegaráen cualquier momento.

translation.en: I can't find my espadrilles. The ones we got in Aruba with the little, uh,
translation.es: No encuentro mis alpargatas,las que compramos en Aruba con esos…

translation.en: the scuba divers on the fronts.
Orlando isn't coming. They're sending someone else.
translation.es: Orlando no viene. Enviarán a otro.

translation.en: [upbeat] I'm Trevor. From, uh, from Housesitters Deluxe.
I'm house-sitting for you this week.
translation.es: Les cuidaré la casa esta semana.

translation.en: On behalf of… er, House-sitters Deluxe,
may I apologize for the last-minute change
translation.es: permítame disculparmepor el cambio de último minuto

translation.en: -in personnel and assure you that -[phone rings]
translation.es: y le garantizoque todo el personal está capacitado

translation.en: all our staff are trained to the same BSI404 house-sitting…
[sighs] I found them, in a drawer with the flip-flops.
translation.es: Las encontréen el cajón de las chancletas.

translation.en: -Is this him? -Good morning, Sir. Pleased to meet you--
Yeah, do you mind if we get on with this?
We're in a bit of a rush and I need to be quick.
Everything you need to know is written in this manual.
translation.es: Todo lo que necesita saberestá en este manual.

translation.en: Special edition Miele, infra red beam to open.
translation.es: Edición especial de Miele,rayo infrarrojo para abrir.

translation.en: Taps are gesture operated. Left for on. Up for hot. Down for cold.
translation.es: Los grifos, con gestos. Izquierda, abre.Arriba, caliente. Abajo, fría.

translation.en: Right for off. Oh, that's Cupcake. She's very friendly.
translation.es: Derecha, cierra.Esa es Cupcake. Es muy sociable.

translation.en: [nervously] Yes, you are friendly, aren't you?
[Nina] Sliding doors. Keys are in this drawer.
translation.es: Puertas corredizas.Llaves están en el cajón.

translation.en: -[Trevor patiently] Okay. -And all the blinds are remote controlled.
translation.es: - Bien.- Y las persianas son a control remoto.

translation.en: Oh, right, I'll… sorry, just a moment, [Nina] And here--
translation.es: Bien… Lo siento, un momento. Abajo.
Bien… Lo siento, un momento. Abajo. Y aquí… ¿Diga?
Y aquí… ¿Diga? Salimos en dos minutos.

translation.en: You'll find all the remotes here. You need me to explain them?
translation.es: Aquí están los controles.¿Precisa que se los explique?

translation.en: -[Nina] Okay, bye. -The dog has a severe nut allergy.
translation.es: - ¡Adiós!- La perra es muy alérgica a las nueces.

translation.en: [firmly] She mustn't eat anything that isn't her prescription dog food.
translation.es: No debe comer nadaque no sea su comida recetada.

translation.en: Or there is, uh, doggie doo-doo everywhere.
translation.es: Si no, hará caca por todas partes.

translation.en: [Nina] We keep the dog food in here.
-So please keep the door closed. -Door closed. Right.
translation.es: - Esta puerta cerrada, por favor.- Puerta cerrada, bien.

translation.en: And the chip in her collar operates the dog flap in there.
translation.es: Y el chip en el collarabre la puertecita que está allí.

translation.en: Because if she can't get out…
There's doggie doo-doo everywhere. It's a recurring theme, yeah. Hey!
translation.es: Habrá caca en todas partes.Es un tema recurrente, sí. ¡Oye!

translation.en: Cupcake, come say bye to Mummy! Yeah? Good girl, good girl. Christian, bags!
translation.es: ¡Cupcake, ven a saludar a mami!Eso es, muy bien. Christian, ¡las valijas!

translation.en: It turned out to be a Kandinsky.
It's worth a lot of money. But not as much as this.
translation.es: Es muy valioso, pero no tanto como esto.

translation.en: It's… an E-type Jaguar, isn't it?
The first E-type Jaguar ever made.
translation.es: El primer Jaguar E-type jamás fabricado.

translation.en: -Huh! Amazing. -What do you think she's worth?
All the locks and the alarm are operated by two simple codes.
translation.es: Todas las cerraduras y la alarmaoperan con dos códigos sencillos.

translation.en: I used the names of famous naval battles to make it easy.
translation.es: Escogí dos batallas navales famosaspara que sea fácil.

translation.en: Uh, so to open, uh, it's the Battle of Frisverhelwilen.
translation.es: Para abrires la batalla de Frisverhelwilen.

translation.en: And to arm the system, even easier, uh, it's the Battle of Bulhornbører.
translation.es: Y para activar el sistema,más fácil aún, batalla de Bulhornbører.

translation.en: Oh… right, yes. I think perhaps I should uh--
Oh no, don't worry. It's all in the manual.
Oh, the manual. Yes, of course.
Yeah, if the panel locks down for any reason,
translation.es: Si, por algún motivo, el panel falla,

translation.en: Nina did have them add a voice override.
translation.es: Nina hizo agregar una anulación por voz.

translation.en: Yes, but that only works with my voice,
translation.es: Pero solo funciona con mi voz

translation.en: [impatiently] and he won't need it anyway because it's all in the manual.
translation.es: y él no lo va a necesitarporque está todo en el manual.

translation.en: The library is strictly out of bounds to the dog.
translation.es: La perra tiene prohibidala entrada a la biblioteca.

translation.en: There's an illuminated manuscript in there that's worth millions.
translation.es: Hay un manuscrito ilustradovalorado en millones.

translation.en: It's a no-go zone for Cupcake, as is our bedroom upstairs.
translation.es: Cupcake no debe entrar ahí,ni en nuestra habitación.

translation.en: Uh, you are in the maid's room, far side down the corridor.
translation.es: La suya es la habitación de la empleada,al fondo del pasillo.

translation.en: You have done this work before, haven't you?
Uh, no, actually. I'm new to the company.
translation.es: De hecho, no. Soy nuevo en la empresa.

translation.en: But please don't worry, I have a house too.
translation.es: Pero no se preocupe, por favor.Yo también tengo una casa.

translation.en: Well, I used to have a house. So all this is very familiar territory.
translation.es: Bueno, tenía una casa.Así que, esto es terreno conocido.

translation.en: Oh here, let me… I'll get that for you.
-Oh, I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry. Let me… -[car honks]
-[Christian] Honey, we have to go! -[Trevor] Oh dear, I'll just…
[Nina] Orlando used to call us every day.
-If you wouldn't mind doing the same. -Absolutely. My pleasure.
translation.es: - Haga lo mismo, si no le molesta.- Claro, será un placer.

translation.en: [female voice] Please leave your message after the tone.
translation.es: Deje su mensaje después de la señal.

translation.en: Hello, sweet pea, it's Dad here. I've got the most amazing news.
translation.es: Hola, tesoro, soy papá.Tengo la mejor de las noticias.

translation.en: I managed to get a job.
Took me a little longer than I was hoping, to be honest.
translation.es: Tardé un poco más de lo pensado,para serte sincero.

translation.en: But you know what this means…
It means that we can still go on holiday together.
translation.es: Significa que aún podemosir de vacaciones juntos.

translation.en: Glue, glue, glue, glue, glue, glue, glue, glue.

translation.es: UHU PEGAMENTO PARA TODO TIPO DE USO

translation.en: [desperately] Give it to me. Come on.
Hi Maddy, it's Dad again. Do give me a call when you can. Okay, thanks, bye.
translation.es: Hola, Maddy, soy papá otra vez.Llámame cuando puedas. Bien, gracias.

translation.en: [hyesterical] The codes. It's all in the manual!
translation.es: Los códigos. Está todo en el manual.¡Todo en el manual!
